channel.title: Fixing Project Annihiation (hyperion)
channel.description:
Can you not run PJA? you get errors when you run? here is how i fixed it! and im showing everyone. firstly. in the lib folder, delete the xstream1.3.1 jar file. Then download this https://nexus.codehaus.org/content/repositories/releases/com/thoughtworks/xstream/xstream-distribution/1.4.2/xstream-distribution-1.4.2-src.zip when you got it, extract it to your PJA files. (merge with files) When you done that. replace your run.bat with this
@echo off java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar;lib/xstream-1.4.2.jar;lib/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar org.hyperion.Server pause
and add a compile.bat ( if you have one already REPLACE it with this!)
@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/junit-2.6.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/xpp3-1,1.4c.jar;lib/xstream-1.4.2.jar -d bin src\org\hyperion\rs2\packet\*.java src\org\hyperion\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\map\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\index\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\obj\*.java src\org\hyperion\cache\*.java src\org\hyperion\fileserver\*.java src\org\hyperion\data\*.java src\org\hyperion\ls\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\util\login\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\task\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\task\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\region\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\fightcaves\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\pestcontrol\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\npc\barrows\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\container\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\model\container\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\event\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\action\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\util\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\pf\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\net\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\net\ondemand\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\login\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\quest\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\quest\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\traveling\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\agility\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\agility\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\farming\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\lunar\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\ancient\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\magic\impl\modern\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\skills\construction\*.java src\org\hyperion\rs2\content\minigames\*.java pause
Now you should be able to run it good luck! :)

item.title: Fixing Project Annihiation (hyperion)
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

Can you not run PJA? you get errors when you run? here is how i fixed it! and im showing everyone.

firstly. in the lib folder, delete the xstream1.3.1 jar file. Then

download this
https://nexus.codehaus.org/content/repositories/releases/com/thoughtworks/xstream/xstream-distribution/1.4.2/xstream-distribution-1.4.2-src.zip

when you got it, extract it to your PJA files. (merge with files)

When you done that. replace your run.bat with this

@echo off java -Xms512m -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar;lib/xstream-1.4.2.jar;lib/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar org.hyperion.Server pause

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/junit-2.6.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/xpp3-1,1.4c.jar;lib/xstream-1.4.2.jar -d bin
